name: Before Restoration - Auto Repair Garage Door
description: Around the turn of the century, the Victorian storefront was replace with a garage door used by many auto related business until the 80s

name: Before Restoration - Original Historic Back Doors
description: The original historic back doors were still in place before restoration began.

name: Before Restoration - Long abandoned upstairs one-room apartments
description: Seven original law offices were converted into one-room apartments in the 1930s. They were long abandoned by the time restoration began.

name: Before Restoration - Sagging floor; stuck doors.
description: The floors were sagging badly (no wonder, engine blocks were stored upstairs)

name: Before Restoration - Each apartment had its own cooking/heating stove.
description: Each of the seven apartments had its own cooking/heating stove, which was removed during restoration.

name: Before Restoration - All seven apartments shared one central bath.
description: Each of the seven apartments had its own cooking/heating stove, which was removed during restoration.

name: Before Restoration - Capped long ago, one of Fort Collins largest skylights.
description: Destined to become an iconic feature of the building, this skylight was capped decades ago.

name: Before Restoration - Capped long ago, one of Fort Collins largest skylights.
description: Tired, leaky, sagging roof needs some TLC.

name: Before Restoration - Capped long ago, one of Fort Collins largest skylights.
description: Original Fabric - they call it. These sad double-humg windows were destined for a new life, fully restored.

name: Restoration Begins - The first order of business is addressing the compromised roof.
description: Jacks press support beams into place, slowly removing the sag from the roof.

name: Restoration Begins - More reinforcement for the roof.
description: The roof was sagging badly, and needed be reinforced before new rubber roofing material is installed.

name: Restoration Begins - More reinforcement for the roof.
description: Skylight cap temporarily removed to allow for roof restoration.

name: Facade Restoration - Chemical cleaning of the brick facade.
description: The first step in restoring the facade is to clean the paint off of the brick.

name: Facade Restoration - Pealing off the chemical blanketing
description: Beautiful brick facade is revealed after chemical cleaning.

name: Facade Restoration - Duplicated ornate column placed next to cast iron original
description: The original cast iron column was preseved over the years inside a brick pilaster. Now the original is used to duplicate the second (white).

name: Facade Restoration - Historically accurate recreation of doors to upper level
description: Using an exact copy still surviving on Jefferson street, the original doors to the upper level are recreated.

name: Facade Restoration - Final Paint
description: Carefully following the guidelines of the Fort Collins Historic Preservation Board, the final paint is applied to the restored facade.

name: Facade Restoration - Rear Garage Door Restored
description: The rear garage door is restored to its original condition, allowing for easy access to the back of the building.

name: Facade Restoration - Front Facade Completed
description: After many months of work, the front facade is finally completed. The original cast iron column was restored, the missing one duplicated, and the brick was cleaned and repaired.

name: Several years later...finally making progress on that skylight.
description: After years working on first floor viability, second floor restoration - with skylight - finally begins.

name: New, custom-built frame for the skylight.
description: Custom-built frame for the skylight, build to last.

name: Fancy new skylight in town!
description: Wow. Stunning. The skylight is finally finished, and what a difference it makes!
